thread.title: Emma Bendall

author: Emma Bendall
title: Emma Bendall
text:
We have an unusual set up in mid north coast Australia - a glorious piece of heaven but a larger endeavour full of animals that we adore. To have Trusted put us in touch with such caring and competent people was beyond our wildest expectations. We can now go away comfortable and have used the service a few times without the slightest issue.
We used to be in tears leaving our puppies in kennels and are just so overjoyed that this option so very well run allows our family to continue to be cared for in their home!
Thanks people!!
